deviceId.description: The device ID, usually serail number

certificateId.description: The ID value of the certificate, sha 256 fingerprint of the certificate

certificatePem.description: The content of the device certificate in PEM format

publicKey.description: The content of the device certificate public key

privateKey.description: The content of the device certificate private key

rootCertPem.description: The content of the MQTTs server SSL certificate root CA certificate in PEM format

createdAt.description: The Unix timestamp when the device was created

isTest.description: A flag indicating whether this is a mock request or not
